Members of Auckland’s exclusive Northern Club want Philip Polkinghorne banned https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/philip-polkinghorne-faceing-calls-for-ban-from-fellow-members-of-aucklands-exclusive-northern-club/673BIOPN6ZBQBH6QINOTE4VB5A/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/philip-polkinghorne-faceing-calls-for-ban-from-fellow-members-of-aucklands-exclusive-northern-club/673BIOPN6ZBQBH6QINOTE4VB5A/ Carolyne Meng-YeeKC claims Polkinghorne has breached the rules, brought club into disrepute. Magnitude-5.7 earthquake hits Wellington https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wellington-earthquake-shakes-central-new-zealand-awake/LYSCGUIF2JEQBPAAHO5VCCEY74/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wellington-earthquake-shakes-central-new-zealand-awake/LYSCGUIF2JEQBPAAHO5VCCEY74/ Isaac DavisonThe magnitude-5.7 earthquake struck minutes after 5am. Sat, 05 Oct 2024 20:37:26 +0000 Over 38,000 people reported they felt the strong earthquake that struck Wellington at 5am this morning on GeoNet.
Revealed: Why WorkSafe NZ dropped a landmark prosecution against police over death of Head Hunter Taranaki Fuimaono in custody https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/revealed-why-worksafe-nz-dropped-a-landmark-prosecution-against-police-over-death-of-head-hunter-taranaki-fuimaono-in-托管/HCN36G3G2BH5XIP7DH33PHEQGU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/revealed-why-worksafe-nz-dropped-a-landmark-prosecution-against-police-over-death-of-head-hunter-taranaki-fuimaono-in-托管/HCN36G3G2BH5XIP7DH33PHEQGU/ Jared SavageDeath of Taranaki 'Ardie' Fuimaono will be investigated by IPCA and Coroner instead. Sat, 05 Oct 2024 16:00:00 +0000 More than 300 mourners attended the funeral of Taranaki 'Ardie' Fuimaono, inset, a Head Hunters gang member who died in police custody in June 2021. WorkSafe prosecuted the police over alleged health and safety breaches but have now withdrawn the charge. Image / NZME
Rotorua woman dies two weeks after attack, man charged with second murder https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/rotorua-woman-dies-two-weeks-after-attack-man-charged-with-second-murder/LFNS2Z6YMFBCZLM6CJ3XHEAOLU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/rotorua-woman-dies-two-weeks-after-attack-man-charged-with-second-murder/LFNS2Z6YMFBCZLM6CJ3XHEAOLU/ The woman and her husband were attacked in their Western Heights home on September 23. Sat, 05 Oct 2024 21:12:36 +0000 Police at the Russell Crescent address in Rotorua where a retired couple were critically injured in an assault on September 23. One of the victims, a woman, died last night in hospital. Photo / Ben Fraser

Snow White ‘named for her resilience not pale complexion’ in Disney remake https://www.nzherald.co.nz/entertainment/snow-white-named-for-her-resilience-not-pale-complexion-in-disney-remake/5HEBHBCT6RH5FNS6GQOL63SAPM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/entertainment/snow-white-named-for-her-resilience-not-pale-complexion-in-disney-remake/5HEBHBCT6RH5FNS6GQOL63SAPM/ India McTaggartThe star of Disney’s live remake offers a different explanation for her character's name. Sat, 05 Oct 2024 20:48:45 +0000 Rachel Zegler said in the latest version, Snow White survived a snowstorm as a baby and was given the name to "remind her of her resilience". Photo / Getty Images
